Meet our awesome team

Every day Handpoint shapes the future of payments

David Gudjonsson
CEO & Co-Founder
Providing a strategy for the company, a vision for the future of payments as well as morale-boosting speeches are David's best qualities.
Thordur Thorarinsson
CFO & Co-Founder
Tracking the company's performance, leveraging the correct business drivers and ensuring that the company is healthy and stable are Thordur's top priorities.
Jody Muehlegger
COO | Head of US
Jody is the one who took Handpoint off the ground in the US and made it a success story
Josh Perry
Head of Sales, US
Josh, a veteran in the payments industry, knows all of its facets and is our man in the field
Juan Jaramillo
CTO | Chief Technical Officer
Juan is Handpoint's technology Guru. He keeps the company's engines running
Hildur Eiriksdottir
Customer & Integration Support
Hildur is the one making the Handpoint experience a triumph for partners and customers
Jon Gustafsson
Product Team
Jon is a true renaissance man. From mobile dev. to integration support, he knows it all
Bjorgvin Kristjansson
Senior Software Engineer
Expert in "C", Bjorgvin is the "masterchief" behind our card reader software.
Haraldur Stefansson
Software Engineer
Halli's expertise in web development is only matched by his foosball skills
Lara Nugent
Head of Sales, EU
Lara has strong relationships with ISVs and works closely with them for deployment strategies
Nicolas Jaeck
Quality Assurance Specialist
Nico is our QA expert, no bugs are safe on his watch, and he's always on duty
Olafur Oskar Egilsson
Lead Product Developer
Oli is our skilled front-end developer, he sees the big picture down into the details and focusing on the user experience is his strength.
Otti Einarsson
System Administrator
Amazon Web Services has no secrets for Otti, he is the one moving Handpoint to the cloud
Sveinn Arnorsson
Senior Software Engineer
Processors and acquirers integrations are Sveinn's territory, he gets to know them all
Antoine Trota
Project Manager
Antoine's responsibilities lie in scoping and designing projects as well as coordinating and following the different teams
Gudrun Hilmarsdottir
Software Engineer
Gudrun is always enthusiastic to use her expertise in EMV and contactless technologies to make our products the best they can be
Gudmundur Johans.
Senior Software Engineer
Gummi is the cornerstone of the backend team, he is the one working behind the scenes to make our systems runs smoothly
Haukur Jonsson
Software Engineer
Haukur can switch programming languages like he changes his shoes, a real polyglot as well as an automation enthusiast
Martha Watts
Support & Technical Writer
Martha demystifies payments for partners. She is the translator between them and developers
Matti Asgeirsson
Senior Software Engineer
Matti makes Handpoint API integration a seamless experience for point of sale developers
